text: Blood group patterns of more than 2,000 patients with the coronavirus in Wuhan and Shenzhen were compared to local healthy populations. Photo: Shutterstock
title: People with blood type A may be more vulnerable to coronavirus, China study finds

meta_data.cse_headline: People with blood type A may be more vulnerable to coronavirus, China study finds
meta_data.cse_socialheadline: People with blood type A may be more vulnerable to coronavirus: study
meta_data.cse_printheadline: blood ‘type A’ people may be more vulnerable to covid-19
meta_data.cse_summary: Preliminary research in Wuhan and Shenzhen indicates patients with the blood group had a higher rate of infection and tended to get more severe symptoms.
